org.apache.felix.ipojo.dependency.interceptors

Interface TransformedServiceReference<S>

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    TransformedServiceReferenceImpl

    public interface TransformedServiceReference<S>
    Transformed service reference is an interface letting updating the properties of a service reference. Transformed service reference wraps a real service reference and has all its properties.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static List<String> FORBIDDEN_KEYS
      These properties are cannot be removed, added or updated.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      TransformedServiceReference<S> addProperty(String name, Object value)
      Adds a property to the reference
      TransformedServiceReference<S> addPropertyIfAbsent(String name, Object value)
      Adds a property to the service reference if this property is not already set on the reference.
      boolean contains(String name)
      Does the service reference contains the given property ?
      Object get(String name)
      Gets the current value of a property.
      getWrappedReference()
      Gets the wrapped service reference
      TransformedServiceReference<S> removeProperty(String name)
      Removes a property from the reference.

    • Field Detail

      • FORBIDDEN_KEYS

        static final List<String> FORBIDDEN_KEYS
        These properties are cannot be removed, added or updated.

    • Method Detail

      • addProperty

        TransformedServiceReference<S> addProperty(String name,
                                         Object value)
        Adds a property to the reference
        Parameters:
        name - the property name
        value - the value (must not be null)
        Returns:
        the current transformed service reference

      • addPropertyIfAbsent

        TransformedServiceReference<S> addPropertyIfAbsent(String name,
                                                 Object value)
        Adds a property to the service reference if this property is not already set on the reference.
        Parameters:
        name - the property name
        value - the value
        Returns:
        the current transformed service reference

      • get

        Object get(String name)
        Gets the current value of a property.
        Parameters:
        name - the property name
        Returns:
        the current value of the property, null if not in the properties.

      • removeProperty

        TransformedServiceReference<S> removeProperty(String name)
        Removes a property from the reference.
        Parameters:
        name - the property name
        Returns:
        the current transformed service reference

      • contains

        boolean contains(String name)
        Does the service reference contains the given property ?
        Parameters:
        name - the property name
        Returns:
        whether the current reference contains a property with the given name

      • getWrappedReference

         getWrappedReference()
        Gets the wrapped service reference
        Returns:
        the wrapped service reference
